"武器携帯数拡張申請試練・Ⅰ":
"This is a training Mision that acts as
an application for the use of more
than 3 weapons, based on ARKS rules.

By collecting these items, the
number of weapons you can use
will no longer be restricted to 3.
Even further increase might be possible.

※Objeto soltado por Caterdra'n"
"Licencia de Exp. de Paleta de Armas"
